Tonsillectomy.context: Tonsillectomy accomplished by sharp and blunt dissection.

adenoidectomy.context: Tonsillectomy, adenoidectomy, and removal of foreign body (rock) from right ear.

removal of foreign body.context: Tonsillectomy, adenoidectomy, and removal of foreign body (rock) from right ear.

rock.context: On the right side, I took out some impacted wax and removed the rock with a large suction.

Hypertrophy of tonsils and adenoids.context: Hypertrophy of tonsils and adenoids, and also foreign body of right ear.

foreign body of right ear.context: Hypertrophy of tonsils and adenoids, and also foreign body of right ear.

very large tonsils.context: She has very large tonsils and she snores at night and gets up frequently at night and does not sleep well.

snores at night.context: She has very large tonsils and she snores at night and gets up frequently at night and does not sleep well.

gets up frequently at night.context: She has very large tonsils and she snores at night and gets up frequently at night and does not sleep well.

does not sleep well.context: She has very large tonsils and she snores at night and gets up frequently at night and does not sleep well.

tonsils were very big.context: At the office we saw the tonsils were very big.

rock in the right ear.context: There was a rock in the right ear and it was very deep in the canal, near the drum.

wax.context: I looked into the left ear under the microscope, took out a little wax and observed a normal eardrum.

normal eardrum.context: I looked into the left ear under the microscope, took out a little wax and observed a normal eardrum.

impacted wax.context: On the right side, I took out some impacted wax and removed the rock with a large suction.

drum intact.context: It was actually resting on the surface of the drum but had not scarred or damaged the drum. The drum was intact with no evidence of middle ear fluid.

middle ear fluid.context: It was actually resting on the surface of the drum but had not scarred or damaged the drum. The drum was intact with no evidence of middle ear fluid.

Afrin drops.context: Afrin drops were placed in both nostrils.

tonsils and adenoids were very large.context: The tonsils and adenoids were very large.

Adenoidectomy.context: Adenoidectomy was performed using the adenoid curette with a tonsil sponge placed into the nasopharynx.

electrocautery.context: Hemostasis achieved with electrocautery and the tonsils beds injected with 0.25% Marcaine with 1:200,000 epinephrine.

Marcaine with 1:200,000 epinephrine.context: Hemostasis achieved with electrocautery and the tonsils beds injected with 0.25% Marcaine with 1:200,000 epinephrine.

sutures of zero plain catgut.context: Sutures of zero plain catgut next were used to re-approximate the posterior to the anterior tonsillar pillars, suturing these down to the tonsillar beds.

suction electrocautery.context: The suction electrocautery was used for pinpoint hemostasis on the adenoid bed.

saline.context: The nose and throat were then irrigated with saline and suctioned.

orogastric tube.context: An orogastric tube was placed. The stomach found to be empty. The tube was removed, as was the mouth gag.

stomach found to be empty.context: An orogastric tube was placed. The stomach found to be empty. The tube was removed, as was the mouth gag.
